column4: hey i lost my user/pass to localhost phpmyadmin. hwo can i find these values?
You're not going to be able to find the password.  That' encrypted (in case that wasn't obvious).  Maybe you can purge and reinstall it?
I have never worked with PHPmyAdmin.  I'm just guessing if you purge it completely (thereby losing all settings) and install from scratch you will be able to start over again.
